doc.summary:
Constraint to limit the objects returned upon query execution.
Constraints are constructed by calling query execution
Constraints can be joined with the methods and .
The methods to modify the constraint evaluation algorithm may be merged, to construct combined evaluation rules. Examples:
For "smaller or equal": Constraint.Smaller().Equal()
For "not like": Constraint.Not().Like()
For "not greater or equal": Constraint.Not().Greater().Equal()
Links two Constraints for AND evaluation.
doc.returns: a new constrain, that can be used for further calls to and

doc.summary: Links two Constraints for OR evaluation.
doc.returns: a new constrain, that can be used for further calls to and

doc.summary:
Used in conjunction with
or
to create constraints like "smaller or equal", "greater or equal". For example:
query.Constrain(typeof(Pilot)); query.Descend("points").Constrain(101).Smaller().Equal();
will return all pilots with points <= 101.
doc.returns: this constrain to allow the chaining of method calls.

doc.remarks:
Sets the evaluation mode to >. For example:
query.Constrain(typeof(Pilot)); query.Descend("points").Constrain(101).Greater()
will return all pilots with points > 101.
doc.returns: this constrain to allow the chaining of method calls.

doc.remarks:
Sets the evaluation mode to <. For example:
query.Constrain(typeof(Pilot)); query.Descend("points").Constrain(101).Smaller()
will return all pilots with points < 101.
doc.returns: this constrain to allow the chaining of method calls.

doc.summary: Sets the evaluation mode to identity comparison.
doc.returns: this constrain to allow the chaining of method calls.

doc.summary: Sets the evaluation mode to "like" comparison.
doc.returns: this constrain to allow the chaining of method calls.

doc.summary: Sets the evaluation mode to string contains comparison.
doc.returns: this constrain to allow the chaining of method calls.

doc.summary: Sets the evaluation mode to string StartsWith comparison.
doc.param: comparison will be case sensitive if true, case insensitive otherwise
doc.returns: this constrain to allow the chaining of method calls.

doc.summary: Sets the evaluation mode to string EndsWith comparison.
doc.param: comparison will be case sensitive if true, case insensitive otherwise
doc.returns: this constrain to allow the chaining of method calls.
this constrain to allow the chaining of method calls.
